sampleVerifications.expectedText: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
sampleVerifications.actualText: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.

sampleVerifications.expectedText: For God so loved the world, that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
sampleVerifications.actualText: For God so loved the world, that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish, but have eternal life.

sampleVerifications.expectedText: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
sampleVerifications.actualText: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

sampleVerifications.expectedText: Blessed are the poor in spirit; for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
sampleVerifications.actualText: Blessed are the poor in spirit; for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

sampleVerifications.expectedText: He who testifies these things says, "Yes, I come quickly." Amen! Yes, come, Lord Jesus.
sampleVerifications.actualText: He who testifies these things says, "Yes, I come quickly." Amen! Yes, come, Lord Jesus.

sampleVerifications.expectedText: God said, "Let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the birds of the sky, and over the livestock, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creeps on the earth."
sampleVerifications.actualText: God said, “Let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the birds of the sky, and over the livestock, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creeps on the earth.”

sampleVerifications.expectedText: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
sampleVerifications.actualText: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

sampleVerifications.expectedText: Blessed is the man who doesn't walk in the counsel of the wicked, nor stand in the way of sinners, nor sit in the seat of scoffers;
sampleVerifications.actualText: Blessed is the man who doesn’t walk in the counsel of the wicked, nor stand on the path of sinners, nor sit in the seat of scoffers;
